pr_title: [IOTDB-605] Add more levels of index in TsFileMetadata

timeline.bodyText: is not empty?
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText: I just feel it should be better if you move this class to org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.file.metadata, because it will be serialized to the end of TsFile.
timeline.author: HTHou

timeline.bodyText: In this case, we'd better provide an API that read all TimeseriesMetadata at a time to reduce IO.
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText: maxDegreeOfIndexNode or so
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText:
This is a bug, deviceMetaData offset may index to a metadataIndex node, not the first metadata offset.
Use TsFileMetadata.getMetaOffset()
timeline.author: qiaojialin
qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText:
Now returns a MetadataIndexNode List, so please change the java doc too.
Also, since this method doesn't only flush ChunkMetadataList, I think we should give it a better name.
timeline.author: HTHou
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -274,9 +280,10 @@ public void endFile() throws IOException {
 
   /**
    * Flush ChunkMetadataList and TimeseriesMetaData
+   *
    * @return DeviceMetaDataMap in TsFileMetaData
    */
-  private Map<String, Pair<Long, Integer>> flushAllChunkMetadataList(
+  private List<MetadataIndexNode> flushAllChunkMetadataList(

replies.bodyText: Great point, I think we could call it flushTsFileMetadata, for flushing both ChunkMetadataList and TimeseriesMetaData. What do you think?
replies.author: samperson1997

replies.bodyText: Actually, we have a class named TsFileMetadata and will be flushed to the disk after executing this method. How do you think? @qiaojialin
replies.author: HTHou

replies.bodyText: Renamed to flushMetadataIndex as he suggested 😂
replies.author: samperson1997

timeline.bodyText: Should we rename deviceMetaDataList to metadataIndexList?
timeline.author: HTHou

replies.bodyText: Thanks, I have checked all the deviceMetaDataList names  and renamed them.
replies.author: samperson1997

timeline.message: Rename some classes, methods and variables
Update the time of inserting empty item in queue
Fix review and update tsfile format-changelist.md
Merge master and fix some problems
Implement in a new way by adding MetadataIndexEntry
Fix code smells and refactor codes
fix bug if ts path does not exist in the tsfile
fix bug if ts path does not exist in the tsfile
Optimize query logic and add unit test
